|brand = ZyXEL |model = NAS326 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = NAS enclosure |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Marvell;88F6810; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARMv7 |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A9 |cpu1spd = 1.6 GHz <!-- 1.6 GHz(1.33 GHz) --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX30LF2G18AC-TI; |flash1size = 256 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Winbond;W632GU6MB-12; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Marvell;88E1512; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 28:28:5D, 08:26:97
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2013.01;Marvell version: 2014_T3.0p6 |stockos = Linux;3.10.39;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, USB 3.0, SATA 3.0, |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 3 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = 2 |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.5 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1),, J3 |jtag = yes,, 20-pin header,, unpopulated,, J1
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = fan, RTC w/ battery, buzzer, |addchip = 8-bit MCU with EEPROM;Holtek;HT66F30;;1;,,, 2A, 18V, 340kHz Synchronous Step-Down Converter;RIchtek;RT7237A;;1;,,, 3A, 18V, 340kHz Synchronous Step-Down Converter;RIchtek;RT7297A;;2;,,, 5.5A, 18V, 650kHz ACOT Synchronous Step-Down Converter;RIchtek;RT6206A;;1;,,, 2A, 4.5V to 18V Synchronous Step-Down Converter;TI;TPS54229;;1;,,, 30V, 8.8A P-Channel MOSFET;Fairchild Semiconductor;FDS4435;;1;,,, 1A Low Dropout Linear Regulator;Advanced Analog Circuits;AZ1117H;;1;,,, Bus Termination Regulator;AME Inc;AME9172M;;1;,,, |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = 1234 |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Debian,
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 06/2016 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 760559123840 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = 9SIA5AD5W08119 |asin = B073SLWYFB |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = 207 x 164 x 123 mm |weight = 1257 g
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Specifications=== *[[Marvell]] 1.6GHz ARM CPU, RAM 512MB DDR3, 128MB Flash, 1x GbE LAN *Two 2.5" or 3.5" SATA II hard disk interface supported up to 24 TB, RAID 0/1/JBOD, 2x USB 2.0, 1x USB 2.0 *PSU: Asian Power Devices DA-60M12; 100~240V 1.5А ÷ 12V 5А :AC Input: 100~240 VAC, 1.5A, 50/60Hz; DC Output: 12V/5A *Dimensions: 207 x 164 x 123 mm *Weight: 1257 g
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/nas/nas-reviews/33001-zyxel-nas326-2-bay-personal-cloud-storage-reviewed ''ZyXEL NAS326 2-Bay Personal Cloud Storage Reviewed'' on '''SmallNetBuilder''']
